Question: Dynavisual AG CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dynavisual AG

CES 2024

- Dynavisual Pad with integrated intelligent textiles and IoT technology
- Flexible and adaptable to specific customer needs
- Integral app to control Dynavisual Pads with predefined or personalized images and information
- Dynamic display for images and information
- Can be used as a light source or as a single pixel for swarm displays
- Intelligent swarm technology enables contextual interconnection with individual or multiple Dynavisual Pads
- Applications include fashion, sports & leisure, work safety, signaling & advertising, monitoring & accompaniment

Team

- Maria-Teresa Fernandez, CEO
- René Schwarz, CTO
- Oliver Schäfer, Business Development Manager

Contact

- Email: hello@dynavisual.com
- Phone: +41 41 534 22 66
- Address: Grienbachstr. 11, 6030 Zug
Summary_cn:
Dynavisual AG公司

CES 2024

- 集成智能纺织品和物联网技术的Dynavisual Pad
- 可根据客户特定需求进行灵活适应
- 内置应用程序，用于控制具有预定义或个性化图像和信息的Dynavisual Pad
- 动态显示图像和信息
- 可用作光源或单个像素用于群体显示
- 智能群体技术实现与单个或多个Dynavisual Pad的上下文互连
- 应用领域包括时尚、体育休闲、工作安全、信号和广告、监测和陪伴

团队

- Maria-Teresa Fernandez, 首席执行官
- René Schwarz, 首席技术官
- Oliver Schäfer, 业务拓展经理

联系方式
